directions: Soak short-neck clams in lightly salted water to draw sand out of the shells, about 2 hours. Rinse.
Combine clams, water, 1/3 cup plus 1 1/2 tablespoon sake, and soy sauce in a pot over medium heat. Bring to a simmer; cook, covered, until clams open, 5 to 6 minutes.
ingredients: 1 green onion, cut on the diagonal
title: Sake-Steamed Short-Neck Clams
